briefTitle: Home-based Exercise Via a Telecommunications System

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 65 years
* Ability to use a telephone without assistance

Exclusion Criteria:

* Angina pectoris
* Myocardial infarction
* Ventricular dysrhythmia currently receiving therapy
* Systolic blood pressure 165 mm Hg or diastolic blood pressure 100 mm Hg

outcomeMeasures.title: Knee Extension Strength
outcomeMeasures.description: The peak force measured during the bilateral knee extension exercise against the highest level of a hydraulic resistance system

outcomeMeasures.title: Knee Extension Strength (Durability)
outcomeMeasures.description: The peak force measured during the bilateral knee extension exercise against the highest level of a hydraulic resistance system

outcomeMeasures.title: Knee Flexion Strength
outcomeMeasures.description: The peak force measured during the bilateral knee flexion exercise against the highest level of a hydraulic resistance system

outcomeMeasures.title: Single Leg Stance With Eyes Open
outcomeMeasures.description: Length of time standing on one leg without moving the support foot, touching the floor or support leg with suspended foot, or requiring assistance.

outcomeMeasures.title: Tandem Stance
outcomeMeasures.description: Length of time standing with the heel of one foot touching the toe of the other foot keeping the feet in a straight line.

outcomeMeasures.title: Six-minute Walk
outcomeMeasures.description: Total distance walked during 6 minutes. Subjects were instructed to walk up and down a 100-foot level hallway as far as they could in 6 minutes.

outcomeMeasures.title: Knee Flexion Strength (Durability)
outcomeMeasures.description: The peak force measured during the bilateral knee flexion exercise against the highest level of a hydraulic resistance system

outcomeMeasures.title: Single Leg Stance With Eyes Open (Durability)
outcomeMeasures.description: Length of time standing on one leg without moving the support foot, touching the floor or support leg with suspended foot, or requiring assistance.

outcomeMeasures.title: Tandem Stance (Durability)
outcomeMeasures.description: Length of time standing with the heel of one foot touching the toe of the other foot keeping the feet in a straight line.

outcomeMeasures.title: Six-minute Walk (Durability)
outcomeMeasures.description: Total distance walked during 6 minutes. Subjects were instructed to walk up and down a 100-foot level hallway as far as they could in 6 minutes.
